common.alert_session_expired: Session expired, refresh the window to start again

TOTPQR.helper_MFAcode: Input the the time-based code from your authenticator App

verifyEmail.helperCode: Input the the code sent to your email

lostPassword.helper_code: Input the code received through email.
lostPassword.helper_privKey: You can find the code for this field in the file that was downloaded when you registered for NeoLogin. Please make sure that the code you are inputting is effecively the same that you downloaded, as it will become the private key associated with this account.

signUp_form.wrongEmail: Your email address seems to be wrong
signUp_form.switch_sync: Sync my encrypted key across devices
signUp_form.warning_sync: Warning: If you disable this option you assume all responsability for your keys, as they will not be recoverable once deleted from the website's storage.
signUp_form.checkbox_newsletter: I want to receive inspiration, marketing promotions and updates via email.
signUp_form.helper_privacy: You must agree to the privacy policy and license agreement
signUp_form.instructionsPrivKey: Please try to download your private key, you can also display it and then copy-paste it somewhere safe. Clicking on the Continue button will take you back to the dApp.
signUp_form.info_registration: Upon registration, you will download a file which contains your private key. You will need it in case you ever lose or forget your NeoLogin password, so save it well!
signUp_form.link_signIn: Already have an account? Sign in

signIn_form.helper_smsMFA: Input the SMS code that we sent you
signIn_form.helper_totpMFA: Input the the time-based code from your authenticator App
signIn_form.link_signUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up
